mapper.select: select c.num as num,c.name as name,c.ctime as ctime,c.maxCount as maxCount,c.studentCount as studentCount,c.roomNum as roomNum,t.name as tname from course as c left join teacher as t on c.teacherNum=t.num

select c.num as num,c.name as name,c.ctime as ctime,c.maxCount as maxCount,c.studentCount as studentCount,c.roomNum as roomNum,t.name as tname from course as c left join teacher as t on c.teacherNum=t.num where c.num in (select courseNum from studentCourse where studentNum=#{num})
